CustomField.formula: IF(OR( AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Proposal'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Decision'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Orders Processing'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Purchase'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closing') ), Amount > 0, NOT(ISBLANK(Price_Book_Name__c)), NOT(ISNULL(Price_Book_Name__c)) ), AND( ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Free Trial Opportunity'), NOT(ISBLANK(Price_Book_Name__c)), NOT(ISNULL(Price_Book_Name__c)) ) ), "https://www.samsara.com/tools/cable-selection-tool/#/?id=" + Id, "")
CustomField.label: Cables Selection Link
